metadata.title: CVE-2020-3811 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
qmail-verify as used in netqmail 1.06 is prone to a mail-addressverification bypass vulnerability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-3811` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

qmail - 1.06-6.2~deb10u1build0.18.04.1
qmail-uids-gids - 1.06-6.2~deb10u1build0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: netqmail package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.06-6.2~deb10u1build0.18.04.1').
